Articles.Content:
Hey guys. This is my first VTOL, I tried my best.

"Spinner" flying car from "Blade Runner"

by volapong

Download: http://www./view/u30s099z0uh6r8t/Spinner_(Blade_Runner).craft

It doesn't look as sleek as it was in the movie though...sorry for my skill.

///Contol///

Handling:

Think of it as a lander with wheels. 90% throttle can get you off the ground. Because it powered by jet

engine, there is delay when throttle up or down. Put on hand brake before going vertical.

Whetever you do don't go too fast or too high.

Action Groups:

1 = Toggle lights.

2 = Toggle red & blue lights.

The future is here:

tried to get the same shot as in the movie but failed.

Actually we drive on the right hand in our country but in US they drive on the left...

///UPDATE///

Download: http://www./view/u30s099z0uh6r8t/Spinner_(Blade_Runner).craft (same as above)

It now come with rocket engine.

///Contol///

Fire the rocket engine in short burst to compensate jet engine delay or slow down your descent.

Action Group

1 = Toggle rocket engine (recommend to fire in short burst)

2 = Toggle light

3 = Toggle red and blue light

///Feedback///

Please give me some feed back. Is other any other suggestion? I wanted to improve my skill.

///Extra///

Here is another thread of mine that lacks feedback.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84881-CF-1-%E2%80%9CSylph%E2%80%9D-the-multi-role-Fighter

Edited July 7, 2014 by volapong
Updates
Since no one reply. I decided to upgrade it...and see if you guys interested.

I like it a lot!

Keep refining the design and improving performance. Make it really flyable and capable of landing safely and you will have a great exploration vehicle!

Keep up the good work Volapong!

Yeah, it's hard to get some love when you start. But it's also hard to get love pretty much always! Still, it's nice stuff you are posting, and if you keep at it, recognition is sure to follow eventually. Have you considered a Rocket Builders thread so you can point people towards it when you post new stuff? The first time you realize someone is actually subscribed to it, it's a very nice warm fuzzy feeling, even if it took you months to get to that point and they seldom comment. And you learn A LOT just by seeing what people post and what people think of your stuff (silence usually means it's good but not spectacular, and considering how hard competition is getting, that is the normal response you should expect).

Rune. Welcome to the builders club, BTW!
Thank you for the tip:), I will keep that in mind.
Wow that is a great looking car

///UPDATE///

Download: http://www./view/u30s099z0uh6r8t/Spinner_(Blade_Runner).craft

It now come with rocket engine.

///Contol///

Fire the rocket engine in short burst to compensate jet engine delay or slow down your descent.

Action Group

1 = Toggle rocket engine (recommend to fire in short burst)

2 = Toggle light

3 = Toggle red and blue light

Edited July 7, 2014 by volapong
